parameters.name: ReplicatorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replicator to be described.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the replicator was created.

nested_items.name: CurrentVersion
nested_items.description: The current version number of the replicator.

nested_items.name: IsReplicatorReference
nested_items.description: Whether this resource is a replicator reference.

nested_items.name: KafkaClusters
nested_items.description: Kafka Clusters used in setting up sources / targets for replication.

nested_items.name: AmazonMskCluster
nested_items.description: Details of an Amazon MSK Cluster.

nested_items.name: MskClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon MSK cluster.

nested_items.name: KafkaClusterAlias
nested_items.description: The alias of the Kafka cluster. Used to prefix names of replicated topics.

nested_items.name: VpcConfig
nested_items.description: Details of an Amazon VPC which has network connectivity to the Apache Kafka cluster.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The security groups to attach to the ENIs for the broker nodes.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: The list of subnets in the client VPC to connect to.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ReplicationInfoList
nested_items.description: A list of replication configurations, where each configuration targets a given source cluster to target cluster replication flow.

nested_items.name: ConsumerGroupReplication
nested_items.description: Configuration relating to consumer group replication.

nested_items.name: ConsumerGroupsToExclude
nested_items.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups that should not be replicated.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConsumerGroupsToReplicate
nested_items.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups to copy.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DetectAndCopyNewConsumerGroups
nested_items.description: Enables synchronization of consumer groups to target cluster.

nested_items.name: SynchroniseConsumerGroupOffsets
nested_items.description: Enables synchronization of consumer group offsets to target cluster. The translated offsets will be written to topic __consumer_offsets.

nested_items.name: SourceKafkaClusterAlias
nested_items.description: The alias of the source Kafka cluster.

nested_items.name: TargetCompressionType
nested_items.description: The compression type to use when producing records to target cluster.

nested_items.name: TargetKafkaClusterAlias
nested_items.description: The alias of the target Kafka cluster.

nested_items.name: TopicReplication
nested_items.description: Configuration relating to topic replication.

nested_items.name: CopyAccessControlListsForTopics
nested_items.description: Whether to periodically configure remote topic ACLs to match their corresponding upstream topics.

nested_items.name: CopyTopicConfigurations
nested_items.description: Whether to periodically configure remote topics to match their corresponding upstream topics.

nested_items.name: DetectAndCopyNewTopics
nested_items.description: Whether to periodically check for new topics and partitions.

nested_items.name: StartingPosition
nested_items.description: Configuration for specifying the position in the topics to start replicating from.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of replication starting position.

nested_items.name: TopicNameConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration for specifying replicated topic names should be the same as their corresponding upstream topics or prefixed with source cluster alias.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of replicated topic name.

nested_items.name: TopicsToExclude
nested_items.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics that should not be replicated.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TopicsToReplicate
nested_items.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics to copy.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ReplicatorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replicator.

nested_items.name: ReplicatorDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the replicator.

nested_items.name: ReplicatorName
nested_items.description: The name of the replicator.

nested_items.name: ReplicatorResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replicator resource in the region where the replicator was created.

nested_items.name: ReplicatorState
nested_items.description: State of the replicator.

nested_items.name: ServiceExecutionRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role used by the replicator to access resources in the customer's account (e.g source and target clusters)

nested_items.name: StateInfo
nested_items.description: Details about the state of the replicator.
(string) ---
(string) ---
